transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji
Customer: Han mere pass call aaya tha do din pehle
Executive: Kahan se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Kolkata se
Executive: Hanji?
Customer: Kolkata se
Executive: Achcha
Executive: Kaun si company?
Customer: Matara Handicraft
Executive: Achcha bataiye sir
Customer: Aapne bataya tha na ye
Customer: call pe aapna product delete karwana hai kya karna hai
Executive: Sir lekin aapko time jo diya tha na wo shayad maine Friday ka diya tha
Customer: Friday 12 baje koi call hi nahi aaya
Executive: Ek second
Executive: Aap apna number bataiye
Customer: Aap apna ek baar registered number bataiye
Customer: 9831
Executive: Ek second sir ek second

Customer: Han sir bataiye number bataiye
Customer: 9831
Customer: 98
Customer: 31
Customer: 31
Customer: 26
Customer: 983168
Customer: 983163
Customer: 983168
Executive: 68 hai achcha thik hai 9 83168
Customer: 60
Customer: 6077
Customer: 77
Customer: 983168
Customer: 6077
Customer: 686607
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: 686607
Executive: 68 ke baad 6607 hai
Customer: Han
Executive: 66
Executive: 07
Executive: Maa Tara Handicraft okay

Executive: Ek minute sir rukiye main na aapke jo account manager hai unko call pe le raha hun
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.

Executive: Maine aapko conference call pe le gaya hai Maa Tara Handicraft se kar rahe hain sir
Executive: Aapne I think time diya tha aaj 12 baje ka sir ko
Customer: Aaj ka nahi maine next day ka diya tha uske kal ka diya tha 12 baje ka virtual meeting ke liye
Customer: Friday 12 baje ka
Executive: Ji ji Friday ka diya tha maine kal
Executive: To Friday ko aapne connect kiya tha sir se
Executive: Abhinav ko
Executive: Ab sir abhi call pe hain wo keh rahe hain ki unhone time diya tha 12 baje ka lekin koi call nahi aaya unke pass
Customer: Nahi nahi next day ka maine Abhinav ko even mail bhi kara tha ki Abhinav connect kar le unse virtual meet se to kal Abhinav ne call nahi kiya tha kya aapko?
Customer: Call aata hoga to main thodi bhi batata
Executive: Achcha achcha you cannot say all these to customer man you have to handle the customer aapko aise samajh aap usne kiya ho ya na kiya ho you should have checked this ek kam karo aap kya bolte hain sir aap kab available ho jayenge?
Customer: Main kal tak available hun
Executive: Aaj aaj kab tak matlab aap aa sakte hain aapne video meeting ke liye bola tha na
Customer: Han
Customer: Maine kuch nahi bola tha aapne call karke bola tha mujhe
Customer: Ye main mere pass whatsapp mein kuch satisfied dissatisfied ka feedback aaya tha main dissatisfied diya tha tab aapka call aaya tha mere pass
Executive: Ji ji maine hi call kara tha aur jo product mein aapke HSN code nahi tha jis product mein aapne add kare hue hain jo product jisme already aapke HSN code nahi hai to wo HSN code wale products remove karke aapke jo primary products hain jo aapne bataya tha ki aapke friends ke products hain wo remove karke aapke sirf products ko add karke unko highlight karne ke liye virtual meeting
Customer: Han wo kal 12 baje se 12 baje pata hai fir call pe bataenge but kuch nahi hua hai mera to din aise hi ja raha hai aur mera koi business nahi ho raha hai
Executive: Are call aaya hota to wo aapko call nahi karte na wo sab baat karne ka there is no benefit aap isko take it forward and aap dekho isko kab time dena hai aur kaise isko wo karna hai thik hai to aap sir bataiye Monday ko aap kis time available rahenge sir
Customer: Monday nahi hoga aap 3 baje ke baad hoga to batao
Executive: Sir aaj to matlab off hota hai hum log ko aur main bhi out of city hun
Customer: To thik hai jab available hona tab batana fir se meeting schedule hona aise karte karte ek saal ho jayega
Executive: Monday se Monday to Friday hamara working hours hota hai to
Customer: Monday se Friday tak main already busy rehta hun
Executive: Achcha to fir kaise schedule kare matlab evening ke time agar aap free ho 6 baje ke baad to main Monday ko agar kar lun arrange
Customer: Wahi to bol raha hun next schedule ke liye call kijiye bata denge ji kaun sa schedule hoga abhi kuch nahi confirm kar payenge
Executive: To sir aap ek kam kijiyega sir ko bataiye aap customer care pe aur us pe karna pada aap coordinate kijiye sahi tarike se aap isme TVRO lagaiye aur TVRO se follow kijiye unke schedule ke hisab se aur isko karwa lijiye thik hai
Executive: Thik hai thik hai thik hai
Customer: Han thik hai sir aapse team coordinate kar legi going forward
Customer: Thik hai
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product deletion not done yet.

- No call received on Friday at 12 PM.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive took customer's registered number.

- Executive connected account manager on conference call.

- Discussed scheduling a virtual meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Team will coordinate with customer going forward.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- virtual meeting, product deletion, schedule
